API Documentation¶

Comprehensive reference material for every public API exposed by Forge:

Core¶

forge.sign()¶

For example:

>>> import forge
>>> @forge.sign(forge.arg('val', default=1))
... def func(val):
...     return val
>>> func(val)
1
